summary: This is an email chain between FBI personnel discussing access to the CAIR system for the JE/GM case review, specifically regarding locating certain items and granting access to individuals. It shows internal coordination for forensic examination in the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: M. NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner
persons.context: Addressed in email regarding setting up new people for case access and coordinating a visit to drop off a hard drive.

persons.name: I. (NY) (FBI)
persons.context: Sent initial email about being in Boston and providing information about item locations in the CAIR system.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
persons.context: Requested location of three items in CAIR and access for individuals to assist in the review.

connections.person1: M. NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner
connections.description: Communicating about case access and forensic examination coordination within the FBI.

connections.person1: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
connections.person2: M. NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner
connections.description: Requesting assistance with locating items in CAIR and setting up access for team members.

events.title: Email coordination for JE/GM CAIR review
events.description: FBI personnel coordinate access to the CAIR system and location of forensic items for the JE/GM case review.
personsInvolved: M. NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner
Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

events.title: Follow-up on missing item
events.description: FBI personnel note they've found all but one item (NYC 024334) and plan to visit CART to drop off a hard drive.
personsInvolved: M. NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner

events.title: Initial request for CAIR access
events.description: FBI personnel request location of three items in CAIR and access for individuals to assist in the review.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

locations: CART (likely Computer Analysis and Response Team location)
keyFacts: FBI personnel are actively coordinating forensic review of the JE/GM case (Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell) in October 2020.
The investigation involves locating specific forensic items in the CAIR system with identifiers like NYC 024394, NYC 024390, and NYC 024334.
Access to the case materials is being managed and granted to specific individuals within the FBI team.
The document is subject to a protective order restricting certain paragraphs from public disclosure.
Communication shows ongoing investigative work nearly a year after Epstein's death and during Maxwell's prosecution.
